characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • characters.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AiCharacter, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Main player object for the game.

      Character(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, float x, float y, CharacterRenderer.Sprite sprite)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 CharacterRenderer.Sprite sprite)
        creates an semi-initialised player the physics body is still uninitiated.
        Parameters:
        world - The game world
        x - The initial x location of the player
        y - The initial y location of the player
        sprite - The sprite the character should look like

    • Method Detail

      • createBody

        public void createBody()
        Creates the physics bodies for the player Sprite.

      • update

        public abstract void update(float delta)
        Updates the player, should be called every update cycle.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in seconds since the last update
